page.title: 02HOUSING _ WALKERGATE
page.content: {Housing}is varied_private and council owned,mainly terraced and semidetached with some detached,houses and bungalows,some 20_30yrs old,others up to about 70_80yrs.There are some blocks of high rise flats but no executive style developments.Most of the houses are red brick,sometimes pebble_dashed with slate roofs.In Orpington Ave.there are some prefabs which were built during the war.Most houses have gardens of various sizes but only the more modern ones tend to have garages.In some areas council housing has been extensively modernised having had new windows, interior walls, heating and so on put in.Modern developments include {sheltered homes}for the elderly and single person flatlets. There are a few purpose_built cottages for {ex_miners.}
